entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DataTrigger not working with Stepper #11050
  • RadioButton crash on Windows #11049
  • MAUI fails to hide keyboard in android when text view control closes the input #11047
  • Changing ApplicationTitle does not trigger a rebuild of the manifest #11046
    Backlog
  • [Windows] MAUI Controls does not render anymore correctly after latest update #11045
  • DEP1000: Cannot copy file #11044
  • Strange entries in the .csproj #11043
  • Warning NU1603 received in File New Maui 7.0 RC2 App #11042
  • [Bug] When navigating the page as PushModelAsync, the content page background color is always black even when the content page background color is set as transparent. #11040
    Backlog
  • MAUI Conversion From XF App does not read App.xml at all #11039
    Backlog
  • Win32 exception on startup when using dependency injection with ContentPage #11038
  • CollectionView: RemainingItemsThreshold not working properly #11037
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid Apps: Integrate API Controllers to fetch data offline via https://0.0.0.0/api/method calls from Javascript Frameworks #11033
  • Checking Permission status throw exception instead of returning the status #11032
  • ScrollView when added with Bindable layout does not work after api call or some seconds delay #11031
    Backlog
  • Multi attach a same Style with AdaptiveTrigger #11030
    Backlog
  • FlyoutBackgroundColor not working when FlyoutBehavior is locked. #11028
    Backlog
  • When the flow direction is changed in ScrollView as RTL, the scrolling direction remains unchanged in iOS and macOS #11026
    Backlog
  • Can't dynamically set HasShadow on Frame #11025
    Backlog

Closed

  • iOS Build Fails with "The application has not been built" on VS Mac #11036
  • Maui Blazor app truncated on Mac #10911
  • ScrollView Does not work if added bindable Layout #11029

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused reference #11048
  • Invoke provisionator with AUTH_TOKEN_GITHUB_COM set #11041
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1370.28 to 1.0.1418.22 #11035
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update templates to have separate default for framework selection #11034
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • [Tizen] Add Shell FlyoutBackDrop #11027
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Feat: Added "Keyboard.None" #11024
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨

Merged

  • Add await for color check to avoid crash and fix DispatcherTest #11022

Updated

  • [Windows] Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #9840
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, high
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Consolidate handlertestbase #11021
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [foldable] XML doc additions #10972
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • If a UISwitch grows too wide it is no longer accessible #10946
    area/a11y
  • Add NeedsExactMeasure check for Editor on Android #10876
    area/layout 🔲, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
